title: E-Tac Light Compound Bow Sight Light 15 Level Rechargeable Li-ion BT Sensor Auto On/Off (Blue (Focused) LED)
features: Super wide brightness range. 15 Levels with memory. It also can be used as a small flashlight (Optional White LED).
Motion sensor controlled Auto On/Off. Just turn your E-Tac Light on and leave it on!
600mAh Li-ion battery. Battery life: approx. 600 hours (level 1), 100 hours (Level 7), 30 Hours (Level 15).
Purple, Blue, & White LED options. The purple & white LEDs are diffused. The Blue LED is focused and works full spectrum.
4 Mounting solutions to fit almost every bow. The E-Tac Light can be solidly mounted on the sight or riser.
description: Super wide brightness range. 15 Levels with memory. It also can be used as a small flashlight (Optional White LED). Motion sensor controlled. Just turn your E-Tac Light on and leave it on! It will turn on the second you move your bow and after a customizable pre-set amount of time without any motion, the on-board motion sensor automatically turns the light off to save battery. The customizable timer can be set from 10 Sec to 10mins. 600mAh Li-ion battery. 2 hours charge time. Battery life: approx. 600 hours (level 1), 100 hours (Level 7), 30 Hours (Level 15). Purple, Blue, & White LED options. The purple & white LEDs are diffused. The Blue LED is focused and works full spectrum. Water-proof LED-housing. CNC T6 aluminum shell, 3/8-32 Thread, nylon-braided cable sealed with epoxy, covered by 5/64‚Äù thick tempered-glass. LCD display. Back-lit/Multi-function. CNC T6 Aircraft aluminum body. Hard-anodizing. Laser engraved. The CNC machined Unibody shell is sealed and covered by an ultralight carbon fiber panel. The Micro-USB port is O-Ring-sealed and water resistant. 4 Mounting solutions to fit almost every bow on the market, old and new. The E-Tac Light can be solidly mounted on the sight or riser with the included CNC aluminum mounts. Two high quality Fast-Chargers included. Items included: E-Tac Light. Purple LED, White LED (optional). Mounting Accessories: 3 CNC T6 Plates, 2 Steel Spacers. Fast Charger-Wall 110-220V. Output: 2A. Fast Charger-Car 12V. Dual Outputs: 2A. Micro-USB Cable. Assorted Screws, Hex Keys. Instructions manual.
